title.rendered: Unprivileged individuals received winter clothing from PH Foundation, a sister concern of Dongyi Sourcing Limited – DSL Blog

content.rendered:
PH Foundation, a CSR organization of Dongyi Sourcing Limited, has distributed winter clothes among less privileged people. PH Foundation is a charity organization.

The PH Foundation helps underprivileged people who require food, clothing, medicine, support for their education, and other necessities. The management of Dongyi Sourcing Ltd (DSL) provides financial, physical, and strategic support

.

The managing director of Dongyi Sourcing Limited, Mofazzal Hosen Pavel, gave madrasa students 300 pieces of winter clothing.

A lot of folks are having difficulties this winter. The managing director of Dongyi Sourcing Limited, Mofazzal Hosen Pavel, stated that “PH Foundation supports those afflicted persons within a short period of time and as a result, we did ask you all for extending your hands to help these less privileged people.”

On a cold and blustery day, our team hit the streets, armed with bags full of winter clothes and blankets. We were met with grateful smiles and heartfelt thanks as we handed out the clothing to those who needed it most.

For many of the people we met, these winter clothes will make a huge difference in their daily lives. It’s something so simple, but it can have a huge impact on their health and well-being as they brave the cold weather.
